title: Quick Access to Validated Patient Data
task: Reviews health data quickly during busy shifts for patient prioritization
summary: As a medical staff, I want to access accurate patient health data quickly without non-critical interruptions, so I can prioritize care efficiently during busy shifts.
cluster:
Quick Access to Validated Patient Data: Pillar 3 - Effective & Personalized Care  
Cluster: (Unclustered)

title: Access Patient Data Without Sharing Consent
task: Experiences frustration due to inability to access data from users refusing sharing
summary: As a medical staff user, I want to access patient health data without consent to prioritize care efficiently during busy shifts.
cluster: Access Patient Data Without Sharing Consent: Strict Privacy Control over Data Sharing

title: Receive Only Formal Clinical Information
task: Prefers receiving formal clinical information rather than emotional or social updates
summary: As a medical staff member, I want to receive only clinical health data without emotional or social information, so I can prioritize patient health efficiently during busy shifts.
cluster: Strict Privacy and Minimal Interaction

title: Block Non-Critical Alerts During Work
task: Blocks all non-critical notifications during work hours to maintain focus
summary: As a medical staff, I want ALFRED to block all non-emergency notifications during my work hours to maintain focus and limit distractions while supporting patient care.
cluster: Block Almost All ALFRED Notifications

title: Immediate Access to Critical Patient Data
task: Relies on accurate data to enable timely medical interventions
summary: As a medical staff, I want to access all patient health data immediately without needing permission, so I can provide timely care during busy shifts.
cluster:
Immediate Access to Critical Patient Data

title: Maintain Professional Distance in Care
task: Maintains professional distance by avoiding emotional engagement with caregiving activities
summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to support clinical caregiving actions including video check-ins with user consent, so I can provide professional care while respecting privacy.
cluster: Strict Voice Activation and Privacy Control

title: Monitor Health Data of Consenting Patients

title: Manage Notifications for Clinical Focus

title: Prioritize Critical Vital Alerts
